entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:02 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
